DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study ZD6474 Treat Multiple Myeloma Cancer
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis multiple myeloma . Patients must minimum serum Mprotein level > =10g/L serum protein electrophoresis patient light chain disease , minimum BenceJones protein 1g/24 hr . Patients must receive prior treatment multiple myeloma : patient may receive 1 2 prior regimen oral alkylating base chemotherapy must relapse follow treatment ( > = 3 month ) OR patient may relapse follow high dose chemotherapy SCT first line treatment provide treatment . Lab inclusion AGC > = 1.0 x10_9/L platelet > = 50 x10_9/L Bilirubin , AST and/or ALT < = 1.5 x UNL ; creatinine < 2 x UNL , Potassium > = 4.0 mmol/L ; calcium magnesium within normal limitsÂ· Patients may > 2 prior regimen chemotherapy and/or prior thalidomide treatment . Patients may nonalkylating base chemotherapy . Patients history malignancy , except : adequately treat nonmelanoma skin cancer , curatively treated insitu cancer cervix , solid tumour curatively treat evidence disease > = 5 year . Pregnant lactating woman . Women childbearing potential must negative pregnancy test within 7 day prior registration must use effective contraception throughout study . Patients relapse treatment oral alkylating chemotherapy . Patients receive 2 prior regimen chemotherapy . Patients receive excluded medication exclude medical condition . Patients receive nonalkylating base chemotherapy regimens initial therapy , therapy recurrent disease .
